p: To validate the model, the initial value of variables was set in 2014, which was simulated in the next 3 years (2014–2016). This would help us demonstrate whether the model aligns with the historical evolution of China’s health delivery system. The validation results are shown in Table 1. The actual data were taken from historical records of the Chinese Health Statistical Yearbook 2017, 29 and the simulated data were the results of validation analysis. One can see that deviation between the actual and simulated data was not significant – namely, between −0. 8162% and 0.1550%, which is a reasonable range. Thus, the model is considered validated and reasonable.
